name: registerLicenses
desc: Registers multiple licenses with the LicenseRegistry.

name: showMyAboutDialog
desc: Displays an About dialog with application details.

name: BaseUtils
desc: A utility class that provides shared resources for the application.

name: prefs
desc:
A reference to the shared preferences of the application.
This can be used to persist data across app launches.

name: random
desc: A random number generator.

name: CenteredTextIconButton
desc:
A custom widget that displays an icon and a text in a centered alignment.
The icon is displayed to the left of the text.
The widget is a button that triggers a callback when pressed.

name: CenteredTextIconButton
desc: Creates a new instance of the widget.

name: build
desc: Builds the widget.

name: height
desc: The height of the button.

name: icon
desc: The icon to be displayed.

name: iconColor
desc: The color of the icon.

name: iconSize
desc: The size of the icon.

name: onPressed
desc: The callback to be triggered when the button is pressed.

name: text
desc: The text to be displayed.

name: textColor
desc: The color of the text.

name: textSidePadding
desc: The padding on the sides of the text.

name: ChooseCategoriesPage
desc:
This is the ChooseCategoriesPage class which extends StatefulWidget.
This class is responsible for displaying the categories to the user.

name: ChooseCategoriesPage
desc: Constructor for the ChooseCategoriesPage class.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: CurrentPlayersPage
desc:
This class represents the Current Players Page in the application.
It extends StatefulWidget, which means this widget can change over time.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: DataBaseHandler
desc:
Class that handles the database
Note: this approach is not very efficient, since we load the whole database
every time we want to play a game
this works under the assumption that the database is quite small
but since it is "only" text based, it should be fine ( < 1MB)

name: loadCategoriesDescriptor
desc: Loads the categories descriptor JSON file and replaces string colors to actual color objects.

name: prepareGameState
desc:
Prepares the game state by loading only the active categories and the questions that have not been played yet.
Then shuffles all questions and adds them to the game state.

name: DefaultScaffold
desc:
Default scaffold as outermost widget to embed other widgets.
Contains a back button and a child widget.

name: DefaultScaffold
desc: Creates a new instance of the widget.

name: actionButton
desc: Action button to be displayed in the bottom right corner (null if none).

name: backButton
desc: If is back button or app icon with dropdown menu.

name: backButtonFunction
desc: Back button functionality.

name: backButtonIcon
desc: The back button icon.

name: backButtonTooltip
desc: Back button tooltip.

name: build
desc: Builds the widget.

name: child
desc: Child widget to be displayed in the scaffold.

name: cutOffAtActionButton
desc:
If view should be cut off at the action button
or if the action buttons float over the view.

name: title
desc: Title of the scaffold.

name: topRightWidget
desc:
Widget that can be displayed on the top right corner
on the same height as the back button.

name: topRightWidgetWidth
desc: Gets padding of one default icon size per default.

name: usesPadding
desc:
Static boolean which defines if the currently visible scaffold
uses padding or not. This changes the layout choices on home and game selection page.

name: GameBombPage
desc:
A page that simulates a game with a bomb.
The bomb has a timer that counts down to an explosion.
The page also includes audio effects for ticking and explosion.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: GameSelectionPage
desc:
GameSelectionPage is a stateless widget that represents the game selection page.
It provides options to start a new game, continue the last game, or choose an old game.

name: build
desc: Builds the widget tree for the game selection page.

name: GameYesNoPage
desc: A StatefulWidget that represents the Yes/No game page.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: GameState
desc: Represents the state of the game.

name: GameState
desc: Initializes a new game with the given active categories.

name: categoriesActive
desc: The list of active categories (by ID).

name: currentQuestion
desc: The current question being asked.

name: GameState.fromJson
desc: Creates a GameState object from a JSON representation.

name: gameId
desc: The unique ID of the game.

name: getNumberOfPlayedQuestions
desc: Returns the total number of questions that have been played.

name: lastPlayed
desc: The timestamp of when the game was last played.

name: next
desc: Returns the next question to be played and handles the xy replacement.

name: players
desc: The list of player names.

name: questions
desc: The list of questions that will be played in this game.

name: questionsPlayed
desc: The list of questions that have been played, categorized by their category ID.

name: toJson
desc:
Converts the GameState object to a JSON representation.
Note: the questions that have been loaded from the database will not be saved!

name: Question
desc: Represents a question in the game.

name: Question
desc: Constructor for the Question class.

name: categoryId
desc: The ID of the category this question belongs to.

name: questionId
desc: The unique ID of this question within its category.

name: value
desc: The text of the question.

name: GameStateHandler
desc: Class used to handle game states, including saving, loading, and playing games.

name: currentGameState
desc: The current game state.

name: getSavedGameStates
desc:
Loads the game states from the shared preferences.
Returns them sorted by the last played timestamp.

name: getSavedGameStatesCount
desc: Returns the count of saved game states.

name: playLastGame
desc: Loads the last (latest) played game state.

name: playNewGame
desc: Starts a new game with the active categories.

name: playOldGame
desc: Loads an old game state.

name: save
desc:
Saves the current game state to the shared preferences.
If the game state has been played before, it replaces the old game state.

name: saveGameStateList
desc:
Saves the list of game states to the shared preferences.
This overwrites the whole list.

name: MyHomePage
desc:
The home page of the application.
It extends StatefulWidget which means it maintains state that can change over time.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: MyApp
desc:
The main widget of the application.
It returns a MaterialApp widget with specified properties.

name: build
desc:
The build method of the MyApp class.
It returns a MaterialApp widget with specified properties such as title, localizationsDelegates,
supportedLocales, theme, navigatorObservers, and routes.

name: main
desc:
The main function of the application.
It ensures Flutter binding is initialized, registers PWA class and licenses,
sets preferred orientation, and then runs the app.

name: MainGamePage
desc:
MainGamePage is a StatefulWidget that represents the main game page.
It manages the game state and handles the game logic.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: MyAnimatedSwitcher
desc:
A custom widget that wraps the AnimatedSwitcher widget.
It allows for different types of transitions: scale, fade, and slide.

name: MyAnimatedSwitcher
desc: Creates a new instance of the widget.

name: build
desc: Builds the widget.

name: child
desc: The child widget to be displayed.

name: transitionType
desc: The type of transition to be used.

name: MyAnimatedSwitcherTransitionType
desc: Enum for defining the type of transition to be used in MyAnimatedSwitcher.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: NavigationUtils
desc: A utility class for handling navigation in the application.

name: fromGamePopTillMain
desc:
Pops all routes until the main route from the game screen.
This sets a flag to true and pops all routes until the main route.

name: popWhenPossible
desc:
Pops the current route as soon as possible.
This is done after the current frame callback, ensuring that the pop operation is done after the widget tree is built.

name: pushNamedAndPopTillMain
desc:
Pushes a new route and removes all other routes from the stack except the main route.
This is done after the current frame callback, ensuring that the operation is done after the widget tree is built.

name: pushNamedWhenPossible
desc:
Pushes a new route as soon as possible.
This is done after the current frame callback, ensuring that the push operation is done after the widget tree is built.

name: routeObserver
desc: An observer for route navigation.

name: wantsToPopTillMain
desc: A flag used in the main game screen since didPopNext is called.

name: OldGamesListSelectionPage
desc: A page for selecting old games from a list.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: UIDefaults
desc: The UIDefaults class contains the default UI settings for the application.

name: backgroundColor
desc: The default background color for the application.

name: colorDefaultButtonText
desc: The default text color for buttons in the application.

name: colorDefaultIcon
desc: The default color for icons in the application.

name: colorGameBodyText
desc: The color for body text in the game.

name: colorNo
desc: The color for 'No' options in the application.

name: colorPrimary
desc: The primary color for the application.

name: colorYes
desc: The color for 'Yes' options in the application.

name: defaultButtonHeight
desc: The default height for buttons in the application.

name: defaultIconSize
desc: The default size for icons in the application.

name: gameBodyTextSize
desc: The default text size for body text in the game.

name: gameBodyTextStyle
desc: The default text style for body text in the game.

name: gameTitleTextSize
desc: The default text size for game titles in the application.

name: UIUtils
desc: A utility class that provides various UI related methods.

name: beautifyStringListForDisplaying
desc:
Beautifies a list of strings for displaying.
Brings for example a list of 'Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie' to 'Alice, Bob & Charlie'.

name: createRandomPastelBackgroundColor
desc: Generates a random pastel color.

name: determinePadding
desc: Returns horizontal and vertical padding depending on screen size.

name: hexToColor
desc: Converts a hexadecimal color code to a Color object.

name: htmlToTextWidget
desc: Converts HTML content to a Text widget.

name: setPreferredOrientation
desc: Sets the preferred device orientation to landscape mode.

name: showToast
desc: Shows a toast message.

name: YesNoSubmitAnswerDialogWidget
desc: A widget that represents the dialog for submitting an answer in a Yes/No game.

name: YesNoSubmitAnswerDialogWidget
desc: Creates a new instance of YesNoSubmitAnswerDialogWidget.

name: answer
desc: The answer object that represents the player's answer.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: setState
desc: The function to set the state of the parent widget.

name: yesNoColor
desc: The color to use for the Yes/No text and slider.

name: YesNoAnswer
desc: Represents an answer in a Yes/No game.

name: answer
desc: The player's answer. It is false by default.

name: guess
desc: The player's guess. It is 0 by default.

name: hasAnswered
desc: Indicates whether the player has answered. It is false by default.
